WELCOME TO THE SUPER APES CLUB

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]SAC is a collection of 10,000 unique super ape NFTs that live on the Ethereum blockchain. Your super ape gets you entry to the Jungle – a member’s only community within the metaverse, free-airdrops on the future collection of the Enchanted Apes, and more! Explore our roadmap for a full list of perks and benefits![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” THE PROJECT

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”1%” bottom_padding=”4%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”7/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

The Concept

The Super Apes Club is a collection of 10,000 unique hand-crafted super apes. What makes super apes different? It’s the character. We’re here to represent people who can express themselves via primal, alpha, and powerful super apes. It’s not about space, it’s not about boredom – it’s about the primal alpha energy![/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text]

The Community

We are all about utility. Our project is to bring together like-minded people that have a never-give-up attitude. If you’re a dark horse – that has come through to the top against all odds – then you’re a super ape! And, with it comes an exclusive set of utilities that you can check out within our roadmap section. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” ROADMAP MILESTONES

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”none” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”column_reverse” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”1%” bottom_padding=”1%” left_padding_desktop=”0″ constrain_group_2=”yes” right_padding_desktop=”0″ top_padding_tablet=”10%” bottom_padding_tablet=”20%” top_padding_phone=”7%” constrain_group_5=”yes” bottom_padding_phone=”7%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” id=”values” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=”” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]

Pre & Public Sale

Only members whose wallets have been whitelisted will be able to mint via pre-sale and public sale. Pre-sale is for those members who have won whitelisted spots via giveaways on Twitter and via roles on Discord. This will be a reserved and guaranteed whitelist. For our public sale whitelist, anyone and everyone can apply for a non-guaranteed whitelist via our discord between 12th and 15th Feb. Our website will randomly pick addresses that will be able to mint on the public sale.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” The Enchanted Apes

Upon 100% completion of our sale, we will launch a new collection of the Enchanted Apes. A collection of 10,000 uniquely crafted enchanted apes that will be airdropped to holders of the Super Apes Club NFT. The only way to get an Enchanted Ape will be to have an existing NFT of the Super Apes Club. The Enchanted Apes will be half-werewolf and half-ape with magical traits![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” 3D Meta Super Apes

Next, we will launch a magical potion that users can take to convert their Super Apes into full-blown 3D meta characters! The Jungle

Within 180 days from the completion of our Public Sale we will launch a Jungle within the metaverse – a place for all our Super Apes to hang out, meet other members, and more! The Super Apes Club will make a purchase of land within the metaverse and design it in & out like a Jungle. The Jungle will be a members-only area.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit”   • 10,000 Super Apes generated from over 300 accessories. Designed by renowned artist Luis, known for his Dragon Ball Z artwork and crowded Comic-Con booths.
  • One price for all. Mint price set at 0.07 ETH.
  • Full provenance to be provided at launch ensuring fair launch and fair minting process for all.
  • Max mint per wallet locked at 2 NFTs.
  • Pre-sale limited to 4000 units. The remainder of 6000 will be allotted for public sale.
  • Pre-sale and Public-sale are both whitelist and raffle-based ensuring protection against gas wars and bots.
  • Reservation of 90 NFTs for creators, designers, staff, giveaways, and rewards.

FAQs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”3%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overflow=”visible” id=”FAQ” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” gradient_type=”default” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” column_position=”default” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][toggles style=”minimal” accordion=”true” accordion_starting_functionality=”default”][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”What is a Super Ape?”][vc_column_text]Super Apes are randomly generated, non-fungible tokens that live on the Ethereum blockchain. A total of 10,000 Super Apes have been created of which ninety will be held from sale to use for rewards, giveaways – and for the creators and the team at SAC.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”How do I buy a Super Ape?”][vc_column_text]To purchase a Super Ape Club NFT you will have to be whitelisted for either the pre-sale or public sale. Our presale would be on 15th of Feb, 2022 at 8 PM UTC. Our public sale would be on 17th of Feb, 2022 at 8 PM UTC.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”What will be the mint price?”][vc_column_text]The mint price would be fixed at 0.07 ETH for all members. No pricing tiers, no special pricing – we’re in this for the long run and believe in fair distribution.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Is this just an avatar?”][vc_column_text]The SAC is a club for those that have made it against all odds. The dark horse – the superhuman. Our concept is all about community – and helping people belong to something that they all can bond over.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”What about marketing campaigns?”][vc_column_text]We are in this for the long haul. Our plans include dedicated PR campaigns, social media ad campaigns, billboards, and a lot more! We will not stop after the first collection – we’ll work on building Enchancted SAC and beyond! We’ll be announcing a lot more plans in the coming future![/vc_column_text][/toggle][toggle color=”Extra-Color-1″ title=”Who is the designer of the Super Apes?”][vc_column_text]The Super Apes have been designed by Luis, known for his Dragon Ball Z artwork and crowded Comic-Con booths.[/vc_column_text][/toggle][/toggles][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container”
